} } } Length:: 5:30 MinsThis is a video review of the "EF24-105 canon camera DSLR coin bank box,novelty toys." I just purchased this camera coin bank and I will not be using it as a bank. Instead, I'll will place my cleaning supplies inside and I will keep it in my camera bag. I should note that it will take over a month to get this item as it ships directly form China or Hong Kong. So just keep that in mind if you want to purchase this item as a gift.
